original_text: You may also use stones from the ground to make an altar for me. But do not use any tools to cut the stones. If you use a tool on the stones, the altar will not be right for you to worship me there.
korean_text: 네가 내게 돌로 제단을 쌓거든 다듬은 돌로 쌓지 말라 네가 정으로 그것을 쪼면 부정하게 함이니라

sentences.original_text: You may also use stones from the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 땅에서 돌들을 사용할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: to make an altar for me
But do not use any tools
If you use a tool on the stones
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 돌들 위에 도구를 사용한다면

sentences.original_text: the altar will not be right
for you to worship me there
